Section 94(1) clearly demonstrates that the power vested within the Minister is
wide and he can make regulations on standing orders pertaining to the computation
of sentences and remissions entitle by the prisoners for the good behavior time to
The learned counsel for the petitioner has also submitted the departmental standing
order amounts to subsidiary legislature which also can be considered by Court of
Law when arriving at a decision. According to the terms of the Prisons regulations,
a year in the prison is considered to be less than an ordinary year.
